Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR following Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION without any rejection step
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR directly follows Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (bypassing intermediate approvers)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER earlier in the same case
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is reached within three process steps from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of the frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is immediately followed by Request Payment (indicating smooth progression to payment)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that originated after a rejection by PRE_APPROVER and subsequent resubmission
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total activity executions accounted for by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR appears more than once in the same trace (re-approval scenarios)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that also include Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER, compared to those that do not
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in high-value claims (case:Amount > 100 euros)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Ratio of successful paths to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR after a Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER versus after a Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of distinct cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is the last approval before Request Payment
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Percentage of all completed reimbursement processes (ending in Payment Handled) that include Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR as a required step
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that do not include any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR executions that occur in variants with no prior rejections compared to those occurring after at least one rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of variants ending in Payment Handled that contain Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR but never passed through Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events occurring in 2018 versus 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that occur without any preceding approval from PRE_APPROVER or BUDGET_OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases
